00023 class fiche_def {
00024   var $cn;           // database connection
00025   var $id;                      // id (fiche_def.fd_id
00026   var $label;                   // fiche_def.fd_label
00027   var $class_base;              // fiche_def.fd_class_base
00028   var $fiche_def;               // fiche_def.frd_id = fiche_def_ref.frd_id
00029   var $create_account;          // fd_create_account: flag
00030   var $all;
00031   var $attribut;                // get from attr_xxx tables
00032   function fiche_def($p_cn,$p_id = 0) {
00033     $this->cn=$p_cn;
00034     $this->id=$p_id;
00035   }
00036 
00037 /* function GetAttribut
00038  **************************************************
00039  * Purpose : Get attribut of a fiche_def
00040  *        
00041  * parm : 
00042  *      - none
00043  * gen :
00044  *      - none
00045  * return:
00046  * none
00047  */
00048   function GetAttribut() {
00049     $sql="select * from jnt_fic_attr ".
00050       " natural join attr_def where fd_id=".$this->id.
00051       " order by ad_id";
00052 
00053     $Ret=ExecSql($this->cn,$sql);
00054 
00055     if ( ($Max=pg_NumRows($Ret)) == 0 )
00056       return ;
00057     for ($i=0;$i < $Max;$i++) {
00058       $row=pg_fetch_array($Ret,$i);
00059       $t = new Attribut($row['ad_id']);
00060       $t->ad_text=$row['ad_text'];
00061       $this->attribut[$i]=$t;
00062     }
00063     return $this->attribut;
00064   }
00065 
00066  /* function Get
00067  **************************************************
00068  * Purpose : Get attribut of the fiche_def
00069  *        
00070  * parm : 
00071  *      - none
00072  * gen :
00073  *      - none
00074  * return:
00075  *       none
00076  */
00077   function Get() {
00078     if ( $this->id == 0 ) 
00079       return 0;
00080     $sql="select * from fiche_def ".
00081       " where fd_id=".$this->id;
00082     $Ret=ExecSql($this->cn,$sql);
00083     if ( ($Max=pg_NumRows($Ret)) == 0 )
00084       return ;
00085     $row=pg_fetch_array($Ret,0);
00086     $this->label=$row['fd_label'];
00087     $this->class_base=$row['fd_class_base'];
00088     $this->fiche_def=$row['frd_id'];
00089     $this->create_account=$row['fd_create_account'];
00090   }
00091 /* function GetAll
00092  **************************************************
00093  * Purpose : Get all the fiche_def
00094  *        
00095  * parm : 
00096  *      - none
00097  * gen :
00098  *      - none
00099  * return: an array of fiche_def object 
00100  */
00101  function GetAll() {
00102    $sql="select * from fiche_def ";
00103 
00104     $Ret=ExecSql($this->cn,$sql);
00105     if ( ($Max=pg_NumRows($Ret)) == 0 )
00106       return ;
00107 
00108     for ( $i = 0; $i < $Max;$i++) {
00109       $row=pg_fetch_array($Ret,$i);
00110       $this->all[$i]=new fiche_def($this->cn,$row['fd_id']);
00111       $this->all[$i]->label=$row['fd_label'];
00112       $this->all[$i]->class_base=$row['fd_class_base'];
00113       $this->all[$i]->fiche_def=$row['frd_id'];
00114       $this->all[$i]->create_account=$row['fd_create_account'];
00115     }
00116   }
00117 /* function HasAttribute
00118  **************************************************
00119  * Purpose : Check in vw_fiche_def if a fiche has 
00120  *           a attribut X
00121  *        
00122  * parm : 
00123  *      - attribut to check
00124  * gen :
00125  *      - none
00126  * return:  true or false
00127  */
00128  function HasAttribute($p_attr) {
00129    return (CountSql($this->cn,"select * from vw_fiche_def where ad_id=$p_attr and fd_id=".$this->id)>0)?true:false;
00130 
00131  }
00132 /* function Display
00133  **************************************************
00134  * Purpose : Display a fiche_def object into a table
00135  *        
00136  * parm : 
00137  *      - none
00138  * gen :
00139  *      -
00140  * return: string
00141  */
00142  function Display() 
00143    {
00144 
00145      $r=sprintf("<TD>%s</TD>",$this->id);
00146      $r.=sprintf("<TD>%s</TD>",$this->label);
00147      $r.=sprintf("<TD>%s</TD>",$this->class_base);
00148      $r.=sprintf("<TD>%s</TD>",$this->fiche_def);
00149      return $r;
00150    }
00151 
00152 }

00155 // class fiche
00157 class fiche {
00158   var $cn;// database connection
00159   var $id; // fiche.f_id
00160   var $fiche_def;               // fd_id
00161   var $attribut;                // array of attribut object
00162   function fiche($p_cn,$p_id=0) {
00163     $this->cn=$p_cn;
00164     $this->id=$p_id;
00165   }
00166 
00167 /* function getAttribute
00168  **************************************************
00169  * Purpose : get all the attribute of a card, add missing ones
00170  *         and sort the array ($this->attribut) by ad_id
00171  * parm : 
00172  *      -
00173  * gen :
00174  *      -
00175  * return:
00176  */
00177   function getAttribut() {
00178     if ( $this->id == 0){
00179       return;
00180     }
00181      $sql="select * 
00182            from jnt_fic_att_value 
00183                natural join fiche 
00184                natural join attr_value
00185                left join attr_def using (ad_id) where f_id=".$this->id.
00186        " order by ad_id";
00187 
00188     $Ret=ExecSql($this->cn,$sql);
00189     if ( ($Max=pg_NumRows($Ret)) == 0 )
00190       return ;
00191     for ($i=0;$i<$Max;$i++) {
00192       $row=pg_fetch_array($Ret,$i);
00193       $this->fiche_def=$row['fd_id'];
00194       $t=new Attribut ($row['ad_id']);
00195       $t->ad_text=$row['ad_text'];
00196       $t->av_text=$row['av_text'];
00197       $this->attribut[$i]=$t;
00198     }
00199     $e=new Fiche_def($this->cn,$this->fiche_def);
00200     $e->GetAttribut();
00201 
00202     if ( sizeof($this->attribut) != sizeof($e->attribut ) ) {
00203 
00204       // !!! Missing attribute
00205       foreach ($e->attribut as $f ) {
00206         $flag=0;
00207         foreach ($this->attribut as $g ) {
00208           if ( $g->ad_id == $f->ad_id ) 
00209             $flag=1;
00210         }
00211         if ( $flag == 0 ) { 
00212           // there's a missing one, we insert it
00213           $t=new Attribut ($f->ad_id);
00214           $t->av_text="";
00215           $t->ad_text=$f->ad_text;
00216           $this->attribut[$Max]=$t;
00217           $Max++;
00218         } // if flag == 0
00219 
00220       }// foreach 
00221       $this->attribut=SortAttributeById($this->attribut);
00222 
00223 
00224     }//missing attribut
00225   }
00226 
00227   function size() {
00228     if ( isset ($this->ad_id))
00229       return sizeof($this->ad_id);
00230     else
00231       return 0;
00232   }
00233   function GetByType($p_fd_id) {
00234      $sql="select * 
00235            from
00236                fiche 
00237             where fd_id=".$p_fd_id;
00238 
00239 
00240     $Ret=ExecSql($this->cn,$sql);
00241     if ( ($Max=pg_NumRows($Ret)) == 0 )
00242       return ;
00243     $all[0]=new fiche($this->cn);
00244 
00245     for ($i=0;$i<$Max;$i++) {
00246       $row=pg_fetch_array($Ret,$i);
00247       $t=new fiche($this->cn,$row['f_id']);
00248       $t->getAttribut();
00249       $all[$i]=$t;
00250 
00251     }
00252     return $all;
00253   }
00254 /* function CountGetByDef
00255  **************************************************
00256  * Purpose : Return array of card from the frd family
00257  *        
00258  * parm : 
00259  *      - the fiche_def_ref.frd_id
00260  *      - p_search is a filter on the name
00261  * gen :
00262  *      -
00263  * return: array of fiche object
00264  */
00265   function CountByDef($p_frd_id,$p_search="") {
00266      $sql="select * 
00267            from
00268                fiche join fiche_Def using (fd_id)
00269             where frd_id=".$p_frd_id;
00270      if ( $p_search != "" ) 
00271        {
00272          $a=FormatString($p_search);
00273          $sql="select * from vw_fiche_attr where frd_id=".$p_frd_id.
00274            " and vw_name ~* '$p_search'";
00275        }
00276 
00277     $Ret=ExecSql($this->cn,$sql);
00278     
00279     return pg_NumRows($Ret) ;
00280   }
00281 /* function GetByDef
00282  **************************************************
00283  * Purpose : Return array of card from the frd family
00284  *        
00285  * parm : 
00286  *      - the fiche_def_ref.frd_id
00287  *      - p_search is an optional filter
00288  * gen :
00289  *      -
00290  * return: array of fiche object
00291  */
00292   function GetByDef($p_frd_id,$p_offset=-1,$p_search="") {
00293     if ( $p_offset == -1 ) 
00294       {
00295         $sql="select * 
00296            from
00297                fiche join fiche_Def using (fd_id)
00298             where frd_id=".$p_frd_id." $p_search order by f_id";
00299       } 
00300     else 
00301       {
00302         $limit=$_SESSION['g_pagesize'];
00303         $sql="select * 
00304            from
00305                fiche join fiche_Def using (fd_id)
00306             where frd_id=".$p_frd_id." $p_search order by f_id
00307            limit ".$limit." offset ".$p_offset;
00308 
00309       }
00310 
00311     $Ret=ExecSql($this->cn,$sql);
00312     if ( ($Max=pg_NumRows($Ret)) == 0 )
00313       return ;
00314     $all[0]=new fiche($this->cn);
00315 
00316     for ($i=0;$i<$Max;$i++) {
00317       $row=pg_fetch_array($Ret,$i);
00318       $t=new fiche($this->cn,$row['f_id']);
00319       $t->getAttribut();
00320       $all[$i]=$t;
00321 
00322     }
00323     return $all;
00324   }
00325   function ShowTable() {

00327       $this->id."</TD>".
00328       "<TR> <TD>".
00329       $this->attribut_value."</TD>".
00330       "<TR> <TD>".
00331       $this->attribut_def."</TD></TR>";
00332   }
00333 /* function strAttribut
00334  **************************************************
00335  * Purpose : return the string of the given attribute
00336  *        (attr_def.ad_id)
00337  * parm : 
00338  *      -
00339  * gen :
00340  *      -
00341  * return:
00342  */
00343   function strAttribut($p_ad_id) 
00344     {
00345       if ( sizeof ($this->attribut) == 0 )
00346         return '- ERROR -';
00347       foreach ($this->attribut as $e)
00348         {
00349           if ( $e->ad_id == $p_ad_id ) 
00350             return $e->av_text;
00351         }
00352         return '- ERROR -';
00353     }
00354 /* function Blank
00355  **************************************************
00356  * Purpose : insert a new record
00357  *        
00358  * parm : 
00359  *      - show a blank card to be filled
00360  * gen :
00361  *      -
00362  * return:
00363  */
00364   function blank($p_fiche_def) 
00365     {
00366       // array = array of attribute object sorted on ad_id
00367       $f=new fiche_def($this->cn,$p_fiche_def);
00368       $array=$f->getAttribut();
00369       $r='<table>';
00370       foreach ($array as $attr)
00371         {
00372           $msg="";
00373           if ( $attr->ad_id == ATTR_DEF_ACCOUNT) 
00374             {
00375               $r.=JS_SEARCH_POSTE;
00376               $w=new widget("js_search_poste");
00377               //  account created automatically
00378               $sql="select account_auto($p_fiche_def)";
00379               echo_debug("class_fiche",__LINE__,$sql);
00380               $ret_sql=ExecSql($this->cn,$sql);
00381               $a=pg_fetch_array($ret_sql,0);
00382               if ( $a['account_auto'] == 't' )
00383                 $msg="<TD> <font color=\"red\">Rappel: Poste créé automatiquement !</font></TD> ";
00384 
00385              }
00386           elseif ( $attr->ad_id == ATTR_DEF_TVA) 
00387             {
00388               $r.=JS_TVA;
00389               $w=new widget("js_tva");
00390             }
00391           else 
00392             {
00393               $w=new widget("text");
00394             }
00395           $w->table=1;
00396           $w->label=$attr->ad_text;
00397           $w->name="av_text".$attr->ad_id;
00398 
00399           $r.="<TR>".$w->IOValue()."$msg </TR>";
00400         }
00401       $r.= '</table>';
00402       return $r;
00403     }
00404 
00405   
00406 /* function Display
00407  **************************************************
00408  * Purpose : Display object instance, getAttribute
00409  *        sort the attribute and add missing ones
00410  * parm : 
00411  *      -
00412  * gen :
00413  *      -
00414  * return: string to display
00415  */
00416   function Display($p_readonly) 
00417     {
00418       $this->GetAttribut();
00419       $attr=$this->attribut;
00420 
00421       $ret="<table>";
00422       
00423       foreach ( $attr as $r) 
00424         {
00425           $msg="";
00426           if ( $r->ad_id == ATTR_DEF_ACCOUNT) 
00427             {
00428               $ret.=JS_SEARCH_POSTE;
00429               $w=new widget("js_search_poste");
00430               //  account created automatically
00431               $sql="select account_auto($this->fiche_def)";
00432               echo_debug("class_fiche",__LINE__,$sql);
00433               $ret_sql=ExecSql($this->cn,$sql);
00434               $a=pg_fetch_array($ret_sql,0);
00435 //            if ( $a['account_auto'] == 't' )
00436 //              $msg="<TD> <font color=\"red\">si vide le Poste sera créer automatiquement</font></TD> ";
00437              }
00438           elseif ( $r->ad_id == ATTR_DEF_TVA) 
00439             {
00440               $ret.=JS_TVA;
00441               $w=new widget("js_tva");
00442             }
00443           else 
00444             {
00445               $w=new widget("text");
00446             }
00447 
00448           $w->label=$r->ad_text;
00449           $w->value=$r->av_text;
00450           $w->name="av_text".$r->ad_id;
00451           $w->readonly=$p_readonly;
00452           $w->table=1;
00453 
00454           $ret.="<TR>".$w->IOValue()."</TR>";
00455         }
00456       $ret.="</table>";
00457       return $ret;
00458     }
00459   /* function Save
00460  **************************************************
00461  * Purpose : Save a card
00462  *        
00463  * parm : 
00464  *      - none
00465  * gen :
00466  *      -
00467  * return:
00468  */
00469   function Save($p_fiche_def=0) 
00470     {
00471       // new card or only a update ?
00472       if ( $this->id == 0 ) 
00473         $this->insert($p_fiche_def);
00474       else
00475         $this->update();
00476     }
00477 /* function insert
00478  **************************************************
00479  * Purpose : insert a new record
00480  *        
00481  * parm : 
00482  *      -
00483  * gen :
00484  *      -
00485  * return:
00486  */
00487   function insert($p_fiche_def) 
00488     {
00489       $fiche_id=NextSequence($this->cn,'s_fiche');
00490       $this->id=$fiche_id;
00491       // first we create the card
00492       $sql=sprintf("insert into fiche(f_id,fd_id)". 
00493                    " values (%d,%d)",
00494                    $fiche_id,$p_fiche_def);
00495       $Ret=ExecSql($this->cn,$sql);
00496       // parse the $_POST array
00497       foreach ($_POST as $name=>$value ) 
00498         {
00499           echo_debug ("class_fiche",__LINE__,"Name = $name value $value") ;
00500           list ($id) = sscanf ($name,"av_text%d");
00501           if ( $id == null ) continue;
00502           echo_debug("class_fiche",__LINE__,"add $id");
00503           
00504           // Special traitement
00505           // quickcode
00506           if ( $id == ATTR_DEF_QUICKCODE) 
00507             {
00508               echo_debug("Modify ATTR_DEF_QUICKCODE");
00509               $sql=sprintf("select insert_quick_code(%d,'%s')",
00510                            $fiche_id,FormatString($value));
00511               ExecSql($this->cn,$sql);
00512               continue;
00513             }
00514           // name
00515           if ( $id == ATTR_DEF_NAME ) 
00516             {
00517               echo_debug("Modify ATTR_DEF_NAME");
00518               if ( strlen(trim($value)) == 0 )
00519                 $value="pas de nom";
00520               
00521             }
00522           // account
00523           if ( $id == ATTR_DEF_ACCOUNT ) 
00524             {
00525               echo_debug("Modify ATTR_DEF_ACCOUNT");
00526               $v=FormatString($value);
00527               if ( isNumber($v) == 1 )
00528                 {
00529                   $sql=sprintf("select account_insert(%d,%d)",
00530                                $this->id,$v);
00531                   $Ret=ExecSql($this->cn,$sql);
00532                 }
00533               if ( strlen(trim($v))==0  )
00534                 {
00535                   $sql=sprintf("select account_insert(%d,null)",
00536                                $this->id);
00537                   $Ret=ExecSql($this->cn,$sql);
00538                 }
00539               
00540               continue;
00541             }
00542         // TVA
00543           if ( $id == ATTR_DEF_TVA ) 
00544             {
00545               echo_debug("Modify ATTR_DEF_TVA");
00546               // Verify if the rate exists, if not then do not update
00547               if ( strlen(trim($value)) != 0 ) 
00548                 {
00549                   if ( CountSql($this->cn,"select * from tva_rate where tva_id=".$value) == 0) 
00550                     {
00551                       echo_debug("class_fiche",__LINE__,"Tva invalide $value");
00552                       continue;
00553                     }
00554                 }
00555             }
00556           
00557           // Normal traitement
00558           $value2=FormatString($value);
00559 
00560           $sql=sprintf("select attribut_insert(%d,%d,'%s')",
00561                        $fiche_id,$id,$value2);
00562           ExecSql($this->cn,$sql);
00563         }
00564       return;
00565       
00566 
00567     }
00568 
00569 /* function update
00570  **************************************************
00571  * Purpose : update a card
00572  *        
00573  * parm : 
00574  *      -
00575  * gen :
00576  *      -
00577  * return:
00578  */
00579   function update() 
00580     {
00581       // parse the $_POST array
00582       foreach ($_POST as $name=>$value ) 
00583         {
00584           echo_debug ("class_fiche",__LINE__,"Name = $name value $value") ;
00585           list ($id) = sscanf ($name,"av_text%d");
00586           if ( $id == null ) continue;
00587           echo_debug("class_fiche",__LINE__,"modify $id");
00588           
00589           // retrieve jft_id to update table attr_value
00590           $sql=" select jft_id from jnt_fic_att_value where ad_id=$id and f_id=$this->id";
00591           $Ret=ExecSql($this->cn,$sql);
00592           if ( pg_NumRows($Ret) != 1 ) {
00593             echo_error ("class_fiche ".__LINE__." INVALID ID !!! ");
00594             return;
00595           }
00596           $tmp=pg_fetch_array($Ret,0);
00597           $jft_id=$tmp['jft_id'];
00598           
00599           // Special traitement
00600           // quickcode
00601           if ( $id == ATTR_DEF_QUICKCODE) 
00602             {
00603               echo_debug("Modify ATTR_DEF_QUICKCODE");
00604               $sql=sprintf("select update_quick_code(%d,'%s')",
00605                            $jft_id,FormatString($value));
00606               ExecSql($this->cn,$sql);
00607               continue;
00608             }
00609           // name
00610           if ( $id == ATTR_DEF_NAME ) 
00611             {
00612               echo_debug("Modify ATTR_DEF_NAME");
00613               if ( strlen(trim($value)) == 0 )
00614                 continue;
00615               
00616             }
00617           // account
00618           if ( $id == ATTR_DEF_ACCOUNT ) 
00619             {
00620               echo_debug("Modify ATTR_DEF_ACCOUNT");
00621               $v=FormatString($value);
00622               if ( isNumber($v) == 1 )
00623                 {
00624                   $sql=sprintf("select account_update(%d,%d)",
00625                                $this->id,$v);
00626                   $Ret=ExecSql($this->cn,$sql);
00627                 }
00628               if ( strlen (trim($v)) == 0 ) 
00629                 {
00630                   $sql=sprintf("select account_update(%d,null)",
00631                                $this->id);
00632                   $Ret=ExecSql($this->cn,$sql);
00633                   continue;
00634                 }
00635             }
00636         // TVA
00637           if ( $id == ATTR_DEF_TVA ) 
00638             {
00639               echo_debug("Modify ATTR_DEF_TVA");
00640               // Verify if the rate exists, if not then do not update
00641               if ( strlen(trim($value)) != 0 ) 
00642                 {
00643                   if ( CountSql($this->cn,"select * from tva_rate where tva_id=".$value) == 0) 
00644                     {
00645                       echo_debug("class_fiche",__LINE__,"Tva invalide $value");
00646                       continue;
00647                     }
00648                 }
00649             }
00650           
00651           // Normal traitement
00652           $value2=FormatString($value);
00653           $sql=sprintf("update attr_value set av_text='%s' where jft_id=%d",
00654                        $value2,$jft_id);
00655           ExecSql($this->cn,$sql);
00656         }
00657       return;
00658       
00659     }
00660 /* function remove
00661  **************************************************
00662  * Purpose : remove a card
00663  *        
00664  * parm : 
00665  *      - none
00666  * gen :
00667  *      - none
00668  * return: 0 if the card is removed otherwise 1
00669  */
00670   function remove() 
00671     {
00672       if ( $this->id==0 ) return;
00673       // verify if that card has not been used is a ledger
00674       $sql="select fiche_used(".$this->id.") as result";
00675       $Res=ExecSql($this->cn,$sql);
00676       
00677       // fetch the result
00678       list($result)=pg_fetch_row($Res,0);
00679 
00680       if ( $result == 0 ) 
00681         {
00682           $sql="select fiche_delete (".$this->id.")";
00683           $Res=ExecSql($this->cn,$sql);
00684           return 0;
00685         }
00686       return 1;
00687     }
00688 
00689 
00690 }
